name: Pony Ready For Winter - Pony physics game
name_original: Pony Ready For Winter - Pony physics game
description: Winter arrived, a small pony wants to spend a happy winter. But has no clothes, how to do ? so cold winter must pay attention to warm ah. Come take a look at what the little Mali winter warmth, you have a way to help her get those things, let her had a warm winter.
